All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    BarCode
    Supply ESC/POS BarCode commands
    BarCode.BarCodeHRIFont
    Provides textHRI font for bar-code.
    BarCode.BarCodeHRIPosition
    Provides Bar Code HRI Positions.
    BarCode.BarCodeSystem
    Provides bar-code system.
    BarCodeWrapperInterface  
    BitImageWrapper
    Supply ESC/POS Bit Image commands.
    BitImageWrapper.BitImageMode
    Values for Bit Image Mode.
    Bitonal
    Abstract base for algorithms that transform RGB to bitonal.
    BitonalOrderedDither
    Implements ordered dithering based on a ditherMatrix
    BitonalThreshold
    Implements bitonal using one threshold value.
    CoffeeImage
    Specify the interface to work with image
    CoffeeImageImpl
    implements CoffeeImage using Java BufferedImage
    EscPos
    Write some usual ESC/POS commands to the OutPutStream.
    EscPos.CharacterCodeTable
    values of character code table.
    EscPos.CutMode
    Values for CutMode.
    EscPos.PinConnector
    Values for pin connector
    EscPosConst  
    EscPosConst.Justification
    Values for print justification.
    EscPosImage
    Supply raster patterns images
    GraphicsImageWrapper
    Supply ESC/POS Graphics print Image commands.
    GraphicsImageWrapper.GraphicsImageBxBy
    Values for Raster Bit Image mode.
    ImageWrapperInterface  
    PDF417
    Supply ESC/POS PDF417 bar-code commands
    PDF417.PDF417ErrorLevel
    Values of Error Correction Level.
    PDF417.PDF417Option
    Values of PDF417 Option.
    PrinterOutputStream
    Supply OutputStream to the printer.
    PrintModeStyle
    Supply ESC/POS text style with the set of Print Mode commands NOTE: You can use this class when your printer isn't compatible with Style class, otherwise, always prefer to use Style class, this is because PrintModeStyle have less features than Style class.
    PrintModeStyle.FontName
    Values of font name.
    QRCode
    Supply ESC/POS QRCode bar-code commands
    QRCode.QRErrorCorrectionLevel
    Values for QR Error Correction Level.
    QRCode.QRModel
    Values for QRCode model.
    RasterBitImageWrapper
    Supply ESC/POS Raster bit Image commands.
    RasterBitImageWrapper.RasterBitImageMode
    Values for Raster Bit Image mode.
    Style
    Supply ESC/POS text style commands Note: If your printer isn't compatible with this class, you can try to use PrintModeStyle class
    Style.ColorMode
    values of color mode background / foreground reverse.
    Style.FontName
    Values of font name.
    Style.FontSize
    Values of font size.
    Style.Underline
    values of underline style.
    TcpIpOutputStream
    Supply OutputStream to the TCP/IP printer.
